algorithm_technique: Sort the array and iterate, keeping track of duplicates and required increments.
problem_summary_simple: Increment array elements to make them all unique with minimum total increments.
problem_summary_technical: Sort array, use a counter for duplicates, and calculate increments greedily based on gaps.
key_insights: Sorting is crucial to efficiently identify consecutive duplicates.
A greedy approach works by filling gaps and handling duplicates sequentially.
The `float('inf')` sentinel simplifies boundary condition handling.
